markdown:
Gorillas can be fiercely protective of their territory, particularly if provoked by hunters or the presence of more dangerous monsters. A gorilla uses its fangs and powerful arms to bite and pummel trespassers with wild abandon. **[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 18 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13 [Gorilla](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2827) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 23 1.1 **Perception** +8; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=69), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=74) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 30 feet **Languages** **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +9, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +11, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7 **Str** +4 **Dex** +2 **Con** +3 **Int** -4 **Wis** +1 **Cha** -2 --- **AC** 18 **Fort** +12 **Ref** +9 **Will** +6 **HP** 45 --- **Speed** 30 feet, climb 30 feet **Melee** fist +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d6+4 bludgeoning **Melee** jaws +11 ([reach 5 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 1d8+4 piercing **Frightening Display** ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The gorilla beats its chest in a terrifying display. Creatures within 30 feet must attempt a DC 20 Will save. While a creature is [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=76) by this ability, it is [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) to the gorilla.
**Critical Success** No effect and temporarily immune for 1 minute.
**Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Failure** The creature is frightened 1.
**Critical Failure** The creature is frightened 2.
Gigantopithecus These fierce kin of orangutans are three times heavier than a gorilla. They are level 4, with statistics roughly akin to an [gorilla](/Monsters.aspx?Elite=true&ID=25).
name: Gorilla

text: Gorilla Gorillas can be fiercely protective of their territory, particularly if provoked by hunters or the presence of more dangerous monsters. A gorilla uses its fangs and powerful arms to bite and pummel trespassers with wild abandon. Creatures within 30 feet must attempt a DC 20 Will save. While a creature is frightened by this ability, it is off-guard to the gorilla. Critical Success No effect and temporarily immune for 1 minute. Success The creature is unaffected. Failure The creature is frightened 1. Critical Failure The creature is frightened 2. Gigantopithecus These fierce kin of orangutans are three times heavier than a gorilla. They are level 4, with statistics roughly akin to an gorilla.
